message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11000. I think this is a great price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10200. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to you.
